 45:     """


 46:     Calculate the area of the ABCD quadrilataire  with corners:


 47:     A(a0,a1)


 48:     B(b0,b1)


 49:     C(c0,c1)


 50:     D(d0,d1)


 51:     @return: area, i.e. 1/2 * (AC ^ BD)


 52:     """

 99:     """


 100:     Calculates histogram of pos weighted by weights


 101: 


 102:     Splitting is done on the pixel's bounding box like fit2D.


 103:     No compromise for speed has been made here.


 104: 


 105: 


 106:     @param pos: 3D or 4D array with the coordinates of each pixel point


 107:     @param weights: array with intensities


 108:     @param bins: number of output bins


 109:     @param pos0Range: minimum and maximum  of the 2th range


 110:     @param pos1Range: minimum and maximum  of the chi range


 111:     @param dummy: value for bins without pixels


 112:     @param delta_dummy: precision of dummy value


 113:     @param mask: array (of int8) with masked pixels with 1 (0=not masked)


 114:     @param dark: array (of float64) with dark noise to be subtracted (or None)


 115:     @param flat: array (of float64) with flat image


 116:     @param polarization: array (of float64) with polarization correction
